title: Jamaica Sunshine
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Juice bar, Take-out, Caribbean, Jamaican
description: A small juice bar & cafe in trendy Kallio area since 2014. Besides juices, smoothies, Jamaican herbal teas, and organic coffee, the owner serves light snack foods like veggie patties with spinach or soya, vegan cakes using Jamaican recipes like spicy ginger cake and banana chocolate cake. Has soya milk option for drinks. Free Wi-Fi.
